LanguageData.Rabbie_Shiporphan.title: Rabbi Lee Ju-sun orphan
LanguageData.Rabbie_Shiporphan.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken on a different ship from his family on the day he moved to outer space. Awakening from the new moon [PAWN_pronoun] mainly participated in city construction and was paid to survive. Work was hard and my family couldn't see forever, but [PAWN_pronoun] was adjusting.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Farmkid.title: Rabbie farm kids
LanguageData.Rabbie_Farmkid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as a beloved child by helping parents' work on the lunar greenhouse farm where the deep space over the glass can be seen. \n\n[PAWN_pronoun]Your field wasn't big, so I didn't have enough living, but I studied at school and learned the knowledge of growing various vegetables, grass, and carrots at home.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Dishwasher.title: Laby restaurant apprentice
LanguageData.Rabbie_Dishwasher.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] washed and cleaned dishes in a restaurant, and learned to cook from his seniors over his shoulder. The vegetable dish made by [PAWN_pronoun] did not receive good reviews, but my colleagues ate it deliciously.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Childsoldier.title: Rabbie boy soldier
LanguageData.Rabbie_Childsoldier.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on the moon in battle. When enemies hit the broken shelter, [PAWN_pronoun] picked up the abandoned gun and chose to fight.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Pickpocket.title: Rabbie City Pickpocket
LanguageData.Rabbie_Pickpocket.baseDescription: Born on the moon still under development, [PAWN_nameDef] walked barefoot in tattered clothes, and earned a living by stealing things by putting his hand in his luggage with his unique dexterity in downtown and subway stations where many rabbis gather. \n\nOne day, [PAWN_pronoun], caught pickpocketing by Rabbie, a bad-natured criminal, was beaten up and never did that again.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Student.title: Rabbie student
LanguageData.Rabbie_Student.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a student commuting to a residential home and school in a peaceful month. He is an ordinary student who loves to play cricket and is concerned about grades and progression.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Hikikomori.title: Rabbie reclusive
LanguageData.Rabbie_Hikikomori.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef], who did not adapt well to the rabbi society, used to make videos and works of his own in a small room with only the noise of computers and servers running and the light of the monitor.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Bully.title: Laby Back Alley
LanguageData.Rabbie_Bully.baseDescription: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] was a fearless outlaw who gathered with the children who followed him in the back streets of a city lit up with blue neon lights. Anyone who was against the planting of [PAWN_pronoun] could not avoid being hit by a ruthless fist and biting in the front teeth.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Adoptedchild.title: Rabbie Mansion's foster daughter
LanguageData.Rabbie_Adoptedchild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up doing chores as a child in the residence of an officer in the moon city. \n\nFortunately, the owner of [PAWN_pronoun] was a good person, so he accepted [PAWN_nameDef] as a foster daughter, allowing him to take a noble education with other children.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Academystudent.title: Rabbie Academy Cadet
LanguageData.Rabbie_Academystudent.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a child born into a family who served in the military for generations. \n\nMy doctor was second, and due to the expectations of my family, I went to the Rabbie Academy instead of regular education and devoted myself to studying and training to enlist as a soldier or officer.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Daylaborer.title: Rabbie
LanguageData.Rabbie_Daylaborer.baseDescription: No one knows where [PAWN_nameDef] is from or where it is going. [PAWN_pronoun] A child like [PAWN_pronoun] was an orphan who was everywhere and nowhere.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Feeder.title: Rabbie breeding turn
LanguageData.Rabbie_Feeder.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was on duty to take care of and breed hairless mice and weasels raised in school. I didn't forget to get water from the bucket and wipe the turtle's back.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Child.title: Rabbie middle class kid
LanguageData.Rabbie_Child.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a kind rabbit who grew up receiving warm love from his parents in an apartment located in the middle of the city. I was always kind to my friends. \n\n[PAWN_pronoun] used to paint a city view of the moon wrapped in blue and neon signs at night with warm light during the day on the balcony of a tall apartment.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Topstudent.title: Rabbie student
LanguageData.Rabbie_Topstudent.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a student living away from his parents in an apartment in the city of the moon. Studying until late and walking back downtown alone was lonely, but the academic achievements were clear.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Studentunion.title: Rabbie Student Council Member
LanguageData.Rabbie_Studentunion.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] does a lot of work. Some of the tasks of transferring teacher documents, catching children who do not follow school rules, and executing student council budgets.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Singer.title: Rabbie Young Musician
LanguageData.Rabbie_Singer.baseDescription: Young [PAWN_nameDef] was a young star who made and sang songs that rabbis liked. Many rabbis thought [PAWN_pronoun] would become a celebrity. I thought so myself.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Clerk.title: Rabbi's power management office
LanguageData.Rabbie_Clerk.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a child who was learning to work with small errands at the Power Management Bureau of the Rabitish Empire. \n\nThe month when [PAWN_pronoun] was born was at war, so instead of basic training, I was trained as an employee.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Bookworm.title: Rabbie Gifted Bookworm
LanguageData.Rabbie_Bookworm.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into an ordinary family, but he liked books and learned anything quickly, so he was a promising child who entered a higher education institution early. \n\nHowever, it was because the time I spent buried in the book was too long, and it seems that I was a little inexperienced in building close relationships with other rabbis or doing outside activities.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Rabbitholeslave.title: Rabbi Rabbit Cave Slave
LanguageData.Rabbie_Rabbitholeslave.baseDescription:
Not long after the arrival of the ship, illegal things happen in the developing lunar city. 

Unfortunately, [PAWN_nameDef] was kidnapped by the rabbi trading team since childhood and had to dig a rabbit hole and mine to die with a shovel. After suffering an accident in which the rabbit's den was buried, he managed to survive. 

Of course, I didn't have the opportunity to get an education.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Poorchild.title: Rabbie poor child
LanguageData.Rabbie_Poorchild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a poor slum in the moon city. The parents of [PAWN_pronoun] fought in poverty and were pessimistic about the life of Sepa. Kind school friends served as the sole support for [PAWN_pronoun].
LanguageData.Rabbie_Gearhead.title: Rabbi Gongsoon
LanguageData.Rabbie_Gearhead.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was unusually interested in the operation of mechanical and electronic equipment from an early age. [PAWN_pronoun], who set up his own workshop in a small warehouse, earned pocket money by repairing TVs and radios, and made various machines with the money.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Nursestudent.title: Rabbie School Health Commissioner
LanguageData.Rabbie_Nursestudent.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a health commissioner who checks for sick students, takes poorly ill friends to the infirmary or wraps a simple bandage. \n\n[PAWN_pronoun], who spent a lot of time in the nursing room, became deeply acquainted with the nursing teacher and was able to build up various medical knowledge.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Subject.title: Laby Rabbit
LanguageData.Rabbie_Subject.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in a facility where rabbies abandoned as a baby and was sent to a laboratory, and then raised under strict control and raised while undergoing genetic manipulation and reinforcement procedures. Other children who could not stand the process lost their lives, but [PAWN_pronoun] gained a superhuman sense and was supposed to be sent to a military facility. [PAWN_pronoun] thought he might have lost something, but he didn't know what it was. It must have been a warm heart.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Deliverygirl.title: Rabbi Vegetable Delivery
LanguageData.Rabbie_Deliverygirl.baseDescription: Even in the Moon City, there are always rabbies who are bothersome to touch each other. [PAWN_nameDef] worked to deliver fresh groceries early in the morning, locating the requested houses in high-rise buildings with a unique fast foot. I fell asleep often in school during the day.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Pubwaitress.title: Rabbie bar employee
LanguageData.Rabbie_Pubwaitress.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a waitress doing small errands at a bar in the city center. We brought various favorite items mixed with planetarium to our guest rabbies, rolled the tobacco, and learned how to make simple cocktails from the bartender.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Builderassistant.title: Laby Interior Engineer Assistant
LanguageData.Rabbie_Builderassistant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the assistant to the team responsible for finishing the interior of the building. \n\nWhile the rabbis on the same team cut and glued tiles and finished the walls, columns and ceilings, they were busy bringing materials and cleaning. [PAWN_nameDef] worked steadfastly because the pay was good and he could learn the skills.
LanguageData.Rabbie_CricketMVP.title: Rabbie Cricket Club Ace
LanguageData.Rabbie_CricketMVP.baseDescription: Short cricket, the most popular sport in the province of the ravity empire, is a great star at school, and [PAWN_nameDef], which boasts a fast foot and accurate hitting, is that rabbi. \n\nThe locker or desk was always full of gifts and letters. Although he was very athletic and sociable, [PAWN_nameDef] became more and more arrogant.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Streamer.title: Rabbie Game Streamer
LanguageData.Rabbie_Streamer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] became a star by broadcasting gameplay with exceptional skills and gaining popularity among rabbies. \n\nWhen I was young, no one in the Moon City did not know [PAWN_nameDef], but after retiring for some kind of work, my childhood fame was forgotten as quickly as it came.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Garrisonkid.title: Rabbie Garrison Child
LanguageData.Rabbie_Garrisonkid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were military rabbies who came down to the planet. [PAWN_nameDef], who was born on a planet and spent his childhood in the base's residence, had the same dream of becoming a soldier and decided to enter the academy at the minimum age limit.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Gunlover.title: Rabbie Firearms Master
LanguageData.Rabbie_Gunlover.baseDescription: There is nowhere to use guns in the Moon City, but [PAWN_nameDef] loved the sophistication and mechanical combination of guns and collected several guns. Yet, to apply for the military, [PAWN_nameDef] used to relieve the frustration at the shooting range because he hated the army's restraint and intensive training.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Failedstudent.title: Rabbie Fallout
LanguageData.Rabbie_Failedstudent.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a lazy student. Until the day before the exam, I would stay up all night playing games and hang out with kids like myself. I didn't have the jaw to get good reviews.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Guitarist.title: Laby band part guitar
LanguageData.Rabbie_Guitarist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] originally didn't want to do much, but with the guidance and recommendation of a good teacher, I became a guitarist playing guitar in the school's band division. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was successful in festivals and performances, and found her talent.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Gamer.title: Rabbie game
LanguageData.Rabbie_Gamer.baseDescription: For [PAWN_nameDef], playing games was a routine, not a hobby. Fascinated by the kind of game that builds, makes and survives, [PAWN_nameDef] was used to miscellaneous knowledge and decorating things. But in fiction.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Littledoc.title: Rabbie's Doctor's Child
LanguageData.Rabbie_Littledoc.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a doctor's family. My father and mother were doctors, and my grandparents were also in the medical field. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] also went on to a related school while studying medicine in anticipation of his parents. The expectations around him that he would become a great doctor were burdensome.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Drugdealer.title: Rabbi organization messenger
LanguageData.Rabbie_Drugdealer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a messenger for a criminal organization as a child. In school lockers, illegally smuggled planetariums and drugs were stored and sold to customers, and rewards were given to organizations. \n\nIt was definitely money, but on some occasions, I was almost taken by the national police, and there were times when it was almost dangerous by other organizations.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Metronometrainee.title: Laby Metronome Trainee
LanguageData.Rabbie_Metronometrainee.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a trainee who receives special training as a metronome, called a living computer. Students learn special logic education and thinking methods that are different from those of ordinary people, and receive a planetarium with a darker concentration than normal. \n\nIf [PAWN_nameDef] goes through the whole process to the end, he will be one of the few special assistants to the Empire, who can remember anything and perform complex calculations in no time.
LanguageData.Rabbie_StudentUnionclerk.title: Rabbie Student Council Secretary
LanguageData.Rabbie_StudentUnionclerk.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef], who also records the contents of student council meetings and documents various documents, was a quiet rabbit who was reluctant to come forward. Everyone went home and stayed in the quiet room or library to write their own books.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Researchassistant.title: Laby Medical Association Research Student
LanguageData.Rabbie_Researchassistant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a rabbie who wandered around the planets of humans, but was reaped by a researcher at the Labytian Academy of Medicine. In an unfamiliar moon city, it was difficult to socialize with young rabbies like him, so he worked as a research assistant at a medical school.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Alleylunatic.title: Rabbie Alley
LanguageData.Rabbie_Alleylunatic.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a rabbie wandering around the alleys of human rural villages. I spent time getting food from the villagers and wearing the clothes they discarded. Of course, I didn't have the money to buy an expensive planetarium. \n\nThe humans gossiped and fingered, but the brain of [PAWN_nameDef], who couldn't consume planetarium, didn't know what that meant. She always laughed and wandered.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Cornershopgirl.title: Rabbie shop girl
LanguageData.Rabbie_Cornershopgirl.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] put a partition on the wall near the moon city station and set up a store the size of only one rabbie. The items sold were candy, chocolate, and tobacco. \n\nIt was barely enough to put it in the mouth of himself and his family, and at least it was illegal, but the imperial police decided to close their eyes a little bit because of the situation of being an orphan with multiple younger brothers.
LanguageData.Rabbie_PetshopKP.title: Laby Pet Shop Owner
LanguageData.Rabbie_PetshopKP.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a child whose parents inherited a pet shop after losing their lives in the war. He was good at caring for reptiles and rodents as well as dogs and cats. I was also good at sales.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Noblesurvivor.title: Rabbie family survivor
LanguageData.Rabbie_Noblesurvivor.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a rabbi child of a prestigious officer who was an officer from generation to generation. After the family collapsed as a peacock of a hostile family, the family scattered. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] escaped from the lunar city where he was born in order to survive, and while hiding his identity, he traversed human cities, planets, and satellites. Doing all kinds of hard work to earn travel expenses.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Planetrabbit.title: Rabbie planet rabbit
LanguageData.Rabbie_Planetrabbit.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a planet without a labyrinth empire, and separated from his parents. \n\nAlthough it was a savage planet, the humans in the village lived with [PAWN_nameDef] who knew nothing, and spent a lot of money to save and feed the planetarium. [PAWN_nameDef] also treated them like their parents and helped hard on the farm.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Flowershopgirl.title: Rabbie florist kid
LanguageData.Rabbie_Flowershopgirl.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked at an expensive flower shop on a street in the lunar city's downtown area.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef], who has no horses around, grew flowers in the back of the shop, adjusted the humidity, and trimmed the garland.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Wealthychild.title: Rabbie upper class child
LanguageData.Rabbie_Wealthychild.baseDescription: Rich rabbits live on the top floor of high-rise buildings densely located in the center of the moon's city center. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] met his parents well and lived with a gold spoon and whatever he wanted, but he was not a stupid and arrogant turtle-like rabbie. She was the only one who was constantly accumulating medical knowledge of interest.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Officerchild.title: Rabbie Officer's Child
LanguageData.Rabbie_Officerchild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the City of the Moon as a child of a senior officer. Following the family's etiquette, I learned how to cut carrots at meals, how to control fighter jets, and how to handle guns and swords.
LanguageData.Rabbie_ExcutiveEnergy.title: Rabbie Power Management Bureau Senior Position
LanguageData.Rabbie_ExcutiveEnergy.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a high-ranking employee of the Power Management Bureau, the core of the Rabitic Empire, and is in charge of supplying and receiving the enormous amount of electricity consumed by the lunar city under military protection. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] led a research department or engineering department, and assisted the Director of Power Management in making important policy decisions.
LanguageData.Rabbie_EngineerEnergy.title: Laby Electric Power Management Bureau Engineer
LanguageData.Rabbie_EngineerEnergy.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a responsible engineer who supplies power to the Moon City, an arcology that consumes enormous power. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] has checked the amount of electricity put into air conditioners, city facilities, and food farms, and inspected and improved the receivers that store energy sent from the planet.
LanguageData.Rabbie_ScientistEnergy.title: Laby Electric Power Authority Scientist
LanguageData.Rabbie_ScientistEnergy.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an elite scientist who graduated from Labitish Imperial University and entered the Power Management Bureau.\n\nIn a national laboratory full of state-of-the-art facilities, or on a planetary site, [PAWN_nameDef] continued to work hard for efficient energy supply. .
LanguageData.Rabbie_StaffEnergy.title: Rabbie Electric Power Management Office Staff
LanguageData.Rabbie_StaffEnergy.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef] is an employee and agent of the Labity City Power Authority. 

Managing and inspecting power plants and power transmission, supervising and training new employees, and various paperwork are [PAWN_nameDef]'s job. 
Occasionally, I had to hold guns with soldiers to protect facilities from planetary people. [PAWN_nameDef] is the young backbone of the empire.
LanguageData.Rabbie_JStaffEnergy.title: Rabbie Power Management Bureau New Employee
LanguageData.Rabbie_JStaffEnergy.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a new employee of the Power Management Bureau, who graduated from university and stepped up as a bureaucrat. \nI'm not familiar with it yet, but soon I was going to be assigned to the right position.
LanguageData.Rabbie_EmpressSecretary.title: Rabbi Empress's assistant
LanguageData.Rabbie_EmpressSecretary.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a concubine loved by Rabbie Empress and a clever rabbi who played the role of a staff or personal assistant. \n\nIt was a very important position, at times when the empire's policy on the planet was decided on the advice of [PAWN_nameDef].
LanguageData.Rabbie_Starshipoverseer.title: Rabbi Lee Ju-sun Supervisor
LanguageData.Rabbie_Starshipoverseer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] would occasionally wake up from hibernation when AI was at a critical crossroads that could hardly be determined, deciding policies that would work best for everyone and solving technical problems. \n\nIt is the responsibility of [PAWN_pronoun] to safely take the rabbies who have been asleep for a long time to another universe, but for a long period of time, only a fragmentary encounter with the artificial intelligence shrouded in the dark was piled up in the memory, and the mind was devastated.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Fleetadmiral.title: Admiral of the Rabbie Fleet
LanguageData.Rabbie_Fleetadmiral.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the admirals who operate the fleet of the ravity empire. \n\nAdmirals mostly live on cosmic flagships, but [PAWN_nameDef] believes that it is important to inspect and manage the planet yourself.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Metronome.title: Rabbie Metronome
LanguageData.Rabbie_Metronome.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef] is a rabbie who has completed metronome training. The brain of [PAWN_nameDef] is prepared with all the information an employer needs, with some of the best conclusions. 

The cost of hiring a metronome as a staff is so enormous that it can be carried by a prestigious house, a Rabbie Empress, or a planetary owner. 

They are also famous for never betraying their employers. Even with no feelings.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Vcommander.title: 래비 승전 사령관
LanguageData.Rabbie_Vcommander.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef]은 정규군을 지휘하는 사령관입니다. 

[PAWN_nameDef]은 달토끼 연대 정규군을 이끌고 이 우주로 오기 전에, 강력한 기술과 군사력을 가진 적 문명을 상대로 총력전을 벌여 승리했습니다. 
그 외에도 여러 래비 제국을 수호했습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_PMCveteran.title: Rabbie PMC veteran
LanguageData.Rabbie_PMCveteran.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef] is a veteran mercenary rabbit with countless experiences in PMC. 

Optimal conclusions were drawn by weighing the enemy's position and allies' positions in each engagement situation, and the choice of [PAWN_pronoun] led the battle to victory or retreat with minimal damage. 
That ability is comparable to a regular commander.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Fighterpilot.title: Rabbie fighter pilot
LanguageData.Rabbie_Fighterpilot.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a pilot rabbi controlling a fighter aboard a ship. \n\nAfter a problem caused the navigation system to be destroyed and bounced out of the operating area, [PAWN_pronoun] barely crash-landed on a planet in the marginal system after a period of time when it was not known whether or not a fighter with hibernation was in operation.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Fieldmedic.title: Rabbie Field Medical Officer
LanguageData.Rabbie_Fieldmedic.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef] has seen many rabbis look terrible during the war. 

[PAWN_nameDef] sees the red cross on his front pocket and finds hope, heals and transports the wounded rabbits on the battlefield and feels the reward of life. 
I've seen a fellow medical officer get caught in an explosion and turn into powder, but I thought it was okay to die like that if I could save others.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Survivorofficer.title: Rabbie Surviving Officer
LanguageData.Rabbie_Survivorofficer.baseDescription:
In a residential area outside the city of a certain month, a young officer [PAWN_nameDef] and his wife were living happily. 

Until one day, rays of light fall to the moon and the city is destroyed. The enemy civilization's military power was strong, and the ravity empire fought a devastating war. 

[PAWN_nameDef] was thrown into space as an air defense shelter without knowing the life or death of his family.
LanguageData.Rabbie_tacticalcommander.title: Rabbie Tactical Commander
LanguageData.Rabbie_tacticalcommander.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was not interested in becoming an officer at first. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef], who was just one of the ordinary infantry, was isolated from the squad members during the war and fell into crisis, but he led them to break through the enemy and survived, and he was promoted to officer in recognition of his criminal record.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Weaponarchitect.title: Rabbie Weapon Design Bureau Engineer
LanguageData.Rabbie_Weaponarchitect.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an elite engineer who graduated from the Imperial University of Labity City. \n\nThis space's Rabbie weapon system and powerful equipment were mostly blueprinted by Cauliflower Works, a team of [PAWN_nameDef], tested, produced and deployed.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Internist.title: Rabbie physician
LanguageData.Rabbie_Internist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] set up a private hospital in the middle of the Moon City for medical treatment. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was a doctor who was respected by many nurses and patient rabbis. Operating the hospital was difficult, but it went well.
LanguageData.Rabbie_surgeon.title: Laby Surgeon
LanguageData.Rabbie_surgeon.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef], who is paid as a pay doctor in the surgical department of a large general hospital, used to treat rabbies by running out of sleep whenever an emergency patient occurred. \n\Sometimes, I've been chasing drunken rabbies and violent rabbis who are causing trouble in the emergency room.
LanguageData.Rabbie_psychiatry.title: Rabbie Mental Health Bureau Medical Center
LanguageData.Rabbie_psychiatry.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] pledged to devote a whole life to health medicine to treat the mental instability imprinted in the genes of the Rabbie race for some kind of work.
LanguageData.Rabbie_excavator.title: Laby Rabbit Excavator
LanguageData.Rabbie_excavator.baseDescription: Digging a rabbit hole is something that rabbis with weak arms avoid, but there are rabbis who have a strong instinct to dig. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was just such a rabbie, and [PAWN_pronoun] laid down what he had been doing and became a paid digging expert who drilled in the lunar shaft. When I was in a dark cave, I felt indescribable comfort.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Moonfarmer.title: Rabbie Moon Farm Farmer
LanguageData.Rabbie_Moonfarmer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the job of [PAWN_nameDef] to squat in the soil of the moon covered in a glass greenhouse and grow potatoes and carrots, broccoli and celery, cauliflower, and various kinds of grains.\n\nShe feels comfortable in her work as a farmer. I decided to live comfortably by sweating without thinking about it.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Schoolteacher.title: Laby School Teacher
LanguageData.Rabbie_Schoolteacher.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a popular teacher because he loved the rabbie students and praised him infinitely. \n\nWhen I went on a trip with students who were about to graduate, many rabbie students wanted to sit down with [PAWN_pronoun].
LanguageData.Rabbie_Businessgirl.title: 래비 사기업 영업요원
LanguageData.Rabbie_Businessgirl.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef] 사기업의 영업요원입니다. 회사의 생산품을 수출하거나 수입해 이윤을 만듭니다. 

토착민과 분란이나 교섭이 일어나면 제국의 교섭권을 회사로 사들여 대상 종족과 접촉하고 협상하기도 했습니다.

배가 고파지면 항상 해당 지역의 맛집을 찾는게 즐거움이었습니다. 덕분에 요리는 할 줄 몰랐어요.
LanguageData.Rabbie_chef.title: 래비 레스토랑 쉐프
LanguageData.Rabbie_chef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]이 만든 채소 요리는 소문이 널리 퍼져 먼 행성에서도 손님이 찾아오곤 했습니다. \n\n[PAWN_pronoun]은 자신의 요리가 종족을 넘어 통하리라 믿고 있습니다. 가게의 뒤에는 요리를 위해 텃밭에 신선한 채소를 기르기도 했습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_NatlAgent.title: 래비 보안국 요원
LanguageData.Rabbie_NatlAgent.baseDescription:
어떤 래비는 이들은 존재하지 않는다고 말하곤 합니다. 

하지만 [PAWN_nameDef]은 분명히 존재했고, 음지에서 활동하며 래비티시 제국에 위협이 되는 사람, 음모, 단체 모두를 수단 방법을 가리지 않고 분쇄했습니다. 

공식적으로는, [PAWN_nameDef]은 덜떨어진 양복점 점원입니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_neet.title: 래비 니트
LanguageData.Rabbie_neet.baseDescription: 성격 때문이든 능력 때문이든, [PAWN_nameDef]은 자신에게 맞는 이렇다한 직업을 찾을 수 없었습니다. \n\n매일매일이 떠가는 구름처럼 무료하게 흘러갔고, 창 밖으로 다른 래비들이 바쁘게 살아가는 모습을 보며 마음 한구석이 약간은 조급해졌으나 또 다른 내일로 내일로 일을 미루고 말았습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Concreteworker.title: 래비 철근공
LanguageData.Rabbie_Concreteworker.baseDescription: 철근 콘크리트로 만들어진 건물을 짓는, 건설 노동자인 [PAWN_nameDef]은 달의 도시의 여러 건설현장에 투입되었습니다. \n\n일은 고되었으나 쉴 때엔 높은 고층건물의 골조 위에 앉아 도시를 내려보며, 달콤한 과자를 곁들인 플라네타륨 차를 마시고 기운을 차리곤 했습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Trafficpolice.title: 래비 교통순경
LanguageData.Rabbie_Trafficpolice.baseDescription: 공식적으로 교차로에서 교통정리를 하는 게 [PAWN_nameDef]의 일이지만, 그런 풍경은 백수십년 전에나 있을 일입니다. \n\n자동화된 교통시스템들과 차량을 가지고 있어 [PAWN_pronoun]의 직책과 제복은 래비 경찰의 상징으로만 남았습니다. 실제로는 주택가를 자전거로 순찰합니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Bartender.title: 래비 바텐더
LanguageData.Rabbie_Bartender.baseDescription: 깔끔한 넥타이와 정장 차림을 한 바텐더였던 [PAWN_nameDef]은 네온 사인이 번쩍이는 바에서 래비들의 칵테일 주문을 받았습니다. 고민거리를 상담하는 일도 했지요. \n\n[PAWN_pronoun]은 언젠가 자신의 가게를 운영하고 싶은 꿈을 키웠습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Serialkiller.title: 래비 연쇄살해범
LanguageData.Rabbie_Serialkiller.baseDescription: 의도치 않은 사고였습니다만, 다른 무고한 래비를 찔러 죽이고도 들키지 않은 [PAWN_nameDef]은 살해가 주는 두근거림에 깊이 빠져들었습니다. \n\n처음엔 불안감에 떨었으나 하루, 이틀 그리고 몇 달이 지나자 불안감은 안도감과 공허로 바뀌었고, 그 욕망을 계속해서 탐하기 시작했습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Stockfarmer.title: 래비 축사 주인
LanguageData.Rabbie_Stockfarmer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 보기드문 래비 가축농장의 주인이었습니다. \n\n달의 도시에 양질의 고기와 가죽 그리고 우유를 공급하는 [PAWN_pronoun]의 농장 덕에 가족들은 부를 쌓았습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Castaway.title: 래비 심우주의 조난자
LanguageData.Rabbie_Castaway.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 인공지능조차 예측하지 못한 사고로 산산히 공중분해된 이주선에 실려 있던 래비 중 한 명입니다. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef]이 동면관 하나만 타고 언제부터 깊은 우주를 얼마나 떠돌았는지는 가늠조차 할 수 없지만, 어떤 행성에 닿은 [PAWN_pronoun]은 문득 동면관을 열게 되었고, 이곳저곳을 떠돌다 이 자리에 있게 되었습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Maid.title: 래비 저택 메이드
LanguageData.Rabbie_Maid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 래비티시 제국 명문가의 숙련된 메이드였습니다. 청소와 세탁, 다과와 차 준비 등 할 일은 수도 없이 많았지만 능숙하게 해냈습니다. \n\n피크닉을 나갈 때엔 언제나 아가씨들을 모셨으며, 기초적인 교육도 맡았습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_MMechanic.title: 래비 설비 유지보수원
LanguageData.Rabbie_MMechanic.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 달의 도시에 씌워진 거대한 풍경 스크린과 계절순환 시스템, 전력설비, 수도설비를 점검하고 보수하는 수많은 기술자 래비들 중 하나였습니다. \n\n어느 날, 실수로 안전사고를 일으켜 눈앞에서 동료를 죽게 만든 [PAWN_pronoun]은 귀를 감싸쥔 채로 직장에서 쫓겨나고 말았습니다. 피에 대한 공포도 함께 가진 채로요.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Companyemployee.title: 래비 대기업 사원
LanguageData.Rabbie_Companyemployee.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 학교를 졸업하고, 좋은 회사에 입사해 착실히 급여를 모으며 행복한 도심 속의 삶을 사는 소시민 래비였습니다. \n\n주말에 쇼핑을 하고, 맛있는 당근 요리를 먹으러 가는 것이 [PAWN_pronoun]의 행복이었습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_BarDancer.title: 래비 술집 댄서
LanguageData.Rabbie_BarDancer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 래비들이 모이는 바에서 몸이 드러나는 옷을 입고, 무대 위에서 춤을 추며, 웃음을 팔았습니다. \n\n모두가 던져주는 돈은 급여보다도 큰 수입이 되었고, 벌이는 좋았지만 뭔가 허전한 마음은 돈으로도 채울 수 없었습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Prostitute.title: 래비 풍속점 접객원
LanguageData.Rabbie_Prostitute.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 풍속점에서 손님을 맞는 래비였습니다. 지명이 들어오면 손님과 마음과 몸을 겹쳐 음란한 일로 래비들을 위로했습니다. \n\n수많은 래비들과 몸을 겹쳤고, 일이 끝난 후의 뒷맛은 씁쓸했지만, 수입은 컸습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Staridol.title: 래비 아이돌
LanguageData.Rabbie_Staridol.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 TV에서 청아한 목소리와 춤, 그리고 가녀리고 아름다운 소녀의 외모로 많은 인기를 얻은 아이돌이었습니다. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef]의 인기는 종족을 가리지 않았습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Housewife.title: 래비 가정주부
LanguageData.Rabbie_Housewife.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 도시에서 약간 벗어난 교외 주택에 살던 가정주부였습니다. \n\n가사와 빨래, 요리를 하며 잔디를 정돈하고 차 한잔을 하며 배우자가 돌아오길 기다리는 굴곡 없는 삶이 계속될 예정이었습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Streetcleaner.title: 래비 청소부
LanguageData.Rabbie_Streetcleaner.baseDescription: 달의 도시에서도 누군가는 청소를 해야 했습니다. [PAWN_nameDef]이 바로 그 일을 맡은 래비였습니다. \n\n도시의 쓰레기통을 비우기를 반복하는 일이었지만 [PAWN_nameDef]는 행복했습니다. 사고로 다친 [PAWN_nameDef]의 머리로는 그보다 더 어려운 일은 할 수 없었으니까요. 그렇지만 마음만은 착했습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Poor.title: 래비 빈민가 주민
LanguageData.Rabbie_Poor.baseDescription:
달의 도시의 외곽, 고층 건물들 밑엔 판자로 지은 빈민촌들이 있게 마련입니다. 
[PAWN_nameDef]은 빈민촌에서 궁핍함을 참고 견뎠지만 계속해서 얼마 안되는 급여를 받는 일밖에 얻을 수 없었습니다. 

[PAWN_nameDef]는 결국 도시를 떠나기로 결심했습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_PMCmiddle.title: 래비 PMC 중견
LanguageData.Rabbie_PMCmiddle.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 군수회사 소속으로 인간 및 다른 종족과 다양한 교전을 겪었습니다. \n\n마음아프게도 같은 팀의 여러 동료들이 죽는 걸 봐 왔지만, [PAWN_pronoun]은 살아남았습니다. 전투 기술은 다듬어졌고, 미숙한 티는 숙련된 얼굴에 덮여 없어져 갑니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_PMCrookie.title: 래비 PMC 신입
LanguageData.Rabbie_PMCrookie.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 군직이 래비 사회에서 갖는 명예와 대우에도 불구하고, 입대보다는 급여를 훨씬 많이 받을수 있는 PMC에 들어가기를 택했습니다. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef]는 오직 큰 돈만이 필요한 사정이 있었습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Controller.title: 래비 스타포트 관제사
LanguageData.Rabbie_Controller.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 달의 도시의 우주공항으로 들어오는 여러 우주선들의 입출항을 관제하는 기술자였습니다. \n\n달의 도시와 거리가 꽤나 멀었기 떄문에 거의 우주공항의 숙소에서 생활했으며, 긴장을 놓으면 천문학적인 금액의 우주선들이나 화물선들이 파괴되거나 이탈할 수 있어 [PAWN_nameDef]은 신경질적으로 변했습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_pharmacist.title: 래비 약품 조제사
LanguageData.Rabbie_pharmacist.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef]은 달의 도시 번화가에 약국을 개업했습니다. 

감기약도, 발진에 듣는 약도, 복통에 먹는 약도 조제 가능했고 플라네타륨도 있었지만 안타깝게도 공부 때문에 침침해진 자신의 눈에 듣는 약은 없었습니다. 

장사는 잘 되었지만 비싼 가게 임대료로 인해 큰 돈은 벌지 못했습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Dispatchedcook.title: 래비 파견 요리사
LanguageData.Rabbie_Dispatchedcook.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef]은 출장을 다니는 고용 요리사입니다. 

제국의 행성 주둔지도, 용병 기지에도, 돈 많은 래비의 여행길에도 함께 다녔습니다. 

[PAWN_nameDef]은 갖은 재료와 식품을 다루고 이국적인 요리도 많이 접하게 되어 뛰어난 대체 요리법과 실력을 가지게 되었습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Enurse.title: 래비 응급실 간호원
LanguageData.Rabbie_Enurse.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 응급실에서 근무하는 간호사였습니다. \n\n응급실 특성 상 위험한 사고를 겪고 온 환자도, 급하게 대처해야하는 증세들도 많았습니다. 때문에 [PAWN_nameDef]은 스트레스 받는 업무를 빠르게, 빠르게 처리하길 원하는 래비가 되어갔습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Factoryworker.title: 래비 공장 근로자
LanguageData.Rabbie_Factoryworker.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef]은 공장 컨베이어 벨트 앞에서 근무하는 근로자입니다. 

 [PAWN_nameDef]는 자신이 만들고 있는 부품이 마지막에 무엇이 되는지 알 수 없었습니다. 
그녀의 일은 그저 복잡한 기계에 들어가는 부품들의 조립상태를 확인하고, 마무리가 덜 된 부품은 들어내서 조립하고 다시 벨트 위에 올려두는것의 반복이었습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Carpenter.title: 래비 건설 목공
LanguageData.Rabbie_Carpenter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 목재로 만들어진 집들을 짓는 목수입니다. \n\n커다란 건설현장에 다니지는 않았지만 작은 주택이나 예쁜 장식들이 달린 카페, 가게처럼 인테리어를 하는 곳으로 다니며 숙련된 기술을 발휘하고 보수를 받는 토끼였습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Steve.title: 래비 기업가
LanguageData.Rabbie_Steve.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef]은 대부분의 래비들이 사용하는 통신기를 개발, 판매하는 기업을 창립했습니다. 

[PAWN_nameDef]가 혁신적이고 세련된 제품을 발표할 때마다 여러 래비들이 열광하며 [PAWN_nameDef]를 칭송했고 [PAWN_nameDef]는 큰 돈을 벌었습니다. 하지만 그의 창의성과 천재성 뒤에는 지독한 성격이 있었고 직원들은 고통받았습니다. 

그렇게 많은 적들을 만든 끝에 [PAWN_nameDef]은 회사에서 해고되고 말았습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Ustudent.title: 래비 제국대학교 학생
LanguageData.Rabbie_Ustudent.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 래비티시 제국의 최고 고등 교육기관이며 기술과 문화의 산실인 제국대학의 촉망받는 인재입니다. \n\n대학의 선배들도, [PAWN_nameDef]도, 뒤이을 후배들도, 존경받는 외부의 군인들과 함께 자신들이 래비 제국을 이끌어 나가는 내부의 주축이 될 것이라 믿어 의심치 않습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_UUstudent.title: 래비 제국대학원생
LanguageData.Rabbie_UUstudent.baseDescription: [PAWN_pronoun]는 잘못된 선택을 해서 비참한 생활을 하고 있었습니다. 후회해도 소용 없습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Mafia.title: 래비 범죄조직 간부
LanguageData.Rabbie_Mafia.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 합법적인 사업을 하는 사기업의 부장입니다. \n\n적어도 겉으로는요. [PAWN_nameDef]은 스파이스 밀수, 도박게임장 운영, 클럽 운영 등 돈을 긁어모으는 온갖 사업에 손을 대고 있었습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_geologist.title: 래비 지질학자
LanguageData.Rabbie_geologist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 보통 행성의 대기와 땅을 조사하고 자료를 만드는 일을 하지만, 가장 중요한 일은 플라네타륨의 함량을 측정하는 것입니다. \n\n제국의 이주선에서 가장 먼저 꺠어나서 본 행성에 내려오는것도 이들입니다. 플라네타륨 함량 미달인 행성의 달엔 래비티시 제국이 정착할 수 없으니까요.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Minedigger.title: 래비 광석 채굴가
LanguageData.Rabbie_Minedigger.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef]은 어떤 정보를 얻어, 대출을 통해 행성의 작은 산을 사들였습니다. 

아는 래비들과 채굴팀을 꾸려 금이 나오리라는 기대로 꾸준히 파들어갔지만 산에서는 아무것도 나오지 않았고, 결국 채굴팀도 떠나갔습니다. 

[PAWN_nameDef]은 혼자서 계속 파들어갔으나 결국 파산하고 말았습니다. 남은건 어두운 곳에서 침침해진 눈 뿐이었습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Stardebrisharvester.title: 래비 별파편 수집가
LanguageData.Rabbie_Stardebrisharvester.baseDescripti: 작은 개인용 채굴우주선을 사들여 귀중한 별의 파편을 수집하러 다니던 [PAWN_nameDef]은 대처할 수 없는 속도로 돌진해온 운석 파편에 우주선이 궤뚫려 표류하고 말았습니다. \n\n긴 시간 끝에 다른 우주선에 의해 구조됐지만, 재산을 전부 처분해 구입한 우주선은 고철이 되고 말았습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Designer.title: 래비 회사 디자이너
LanguageData.Rabbie_Designer.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef]은 달의 도시 외곽에 있는 작은 회사에 다닙니다. 

[PAWN_nameDef]는 물품을 기획하고 그리는 디자이너로 고용되었고, 빨리 경험을 쌓으려 했지만 아직까지는 큰 성과를 내지 못했습니다. 
하지만 긍정적인 마음은 잃지 않았지요.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Escapedslave.title: 래비 도망친 노예
LanguageData.Rabbie_Escapedslave.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 행성의 나쁜 인간에게 납치되어 오래도록 노동과 불법적인 일까지 시켜지며 노예로 부려졌습니다. \n\n어느 날 [PAWN_pronoun]은 기회를 틈타 인간을 찌르고 도망쳤고 달의 도시로 돌아갈 방법을 찾고 있었습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Deserter.title: 래비 탈영병
LanguageData.Rabbie_Deserter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 마음이 심약해 군직에 어울리지 않는 래비였습니다. 총만 들면 두려움에 떨며 귀를 감싸쥐고 울상이 되었습니다. \n\n주변에서 의무병이나 군견병으로 복무하게 해 준 배려에도 불구하고, 결국 [PAWN_nameDef]은 도망을 치고 말았습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_MBoss.title: 래비 범죄조직 보스
LanguageData.Rabbie_MBoss.baseDescription:
과거에 [PAWN_nameDef]은 래비 범죄 조직의 보스였습니다. 

경찰조직마저 장악하고 어떤 변방계의 달의 전체를 점령할 뻔했던 [PAWN_nameDef]의 폭력조직은, 엠프레스의 강압으로 나선 래비티시 제국의 정규군에 무자비하게 학살당하고 분쇄되고 말았습니다. 

하지만 [PAWN_nameDef]은 결국 막대한 보석금과 로비, 사법거래를 통해 풀려났습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Maddoc.title: 래비 정신나간 의사
LanguageData.Rabbie_Maddoc.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 달의 도시의 성형외과 의사였습니다. \n\n오랜 진료 끝에 자기가 생각하는 비뚤어진 아름다움을 고객에게 마음대로 시술했다가 달의 법정에 서게 됐습니다. 그 끔찍함에 달의 법관들도 고개를 젓고 [PAWN_nameDef]의 의사 면허를 취소시킨 후, 행성의 오지로 추방했습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Mechchaser.title: 래비 메크추적자
LanguageData.Rabbie_Mechchaser.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 가족들을 살해한 이 우주의 메카노이드를 전부 박멸하겠다는 복수의 일념으로 모든 것을 포기했습니다. \n\n개인 전투기를 타고 메카노이드를 추적하고 다닙니는 [PAWN_nameDef]는 벌써 혼자서 몇 건이나 메카노이드들의 자가생산 시설을 파괴했으며, 그런 [PAWN_nameDef]에게 제국의 보안국도 어느정도 지원을 하고 있습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Bountyhunter.title: 래비 현상금 사냥꾼
LanguageData.Rabbie_Bountyhunter.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef]은 인간들이 현상금을 건 대상을 죽이고 현상금을 수령하는 래비입니다. 

죽여서요. 

[PAWN_nameDef]는 살릴 수 있는 대상도 살려서 데려와 본 적이 없습니다. 심지어 생포하는 조건에 더 높은 금액이 걸려 있어도, 이미 생포한 대상의 뒤통수에 총알을 박아넣곤 했습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_BackwardDoc.title: 래비 오지 의사
LanguageData.Rabbie_BackwardDoc.baseDescription:
낙후하고 약품도 별로 없는 중세계 행성에서 [PAWN_nameDef]은 정체를 숨기고 의사로 활동했습니다. 

어느 날, 플라네타륨 차를 마시던 [PAWN_nameDef]를 엿보던 인간이 그것을 마녀의 약으로 고발하는 바람에 [PAWN_nameDef]는 재판대에 섰고, 그녀는 꼼짝없이 마녀로 몰렸습니다. 

[PAWN_nameDef]는 눈물을 머금고 감옥을 탈출해 우주선을 타고 다른 행성으로 향했습니다. 그녀가 정말 마녀인지 아닌지는 아무도 모릅니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Penitentwanderer.title: 래비 참회하는 방랑자
LanguageData.Rabbie_Penitentwanderer.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef]은 래비티시 제국의 정규군이었으나 낙후된 변방계에서 원주민 마을에 정착했습니다. 

그들과 흙과 바람, 물 속을 다니며 자연으로 돌아간 해방감을 맛봤습니다. 그러나 자연 속에서라면 괜찮으리라는 기대에도 불구하고 플라네타륨이 고갈된 [PAWN_nameDef]은 의식이 없는 채로 마을 주민들을 쏘아 죽이고 말았습니다. 

비탄과 우울에 가득차 [PAWN_nameDef]은 참회하며 떠돌고 있습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_retiredcommander.title: 래비 생존한 보병
LanguageData.Rabbie_retiredcommander.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]는 래비티시 제국의 정규군이며, 출신 달도시의 본행성은 이미 고도로 발달한 문명을 이룩한 곳이었습니다. \n\n본 행성과 래비티시 제국과의 미묘한 관계는 결국 전쟁으로 번졌고, [PAWN_nameDef]는 치열한 방어전을 치렀지만 아직 개발중이던 달의 도시는 버틸 수 없었습니다. 동면 탈출기에 몸을 싣고 떠난지 며칠만에, 지내던 달의 도시는 인간의 전쟁 기계들에 의해 철저히 파괴되었습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Emuhunter.title: 래비 에뮤 잡이
LanguageData.Rabbie_Emuhunter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]가 도착했던 행성은 전체가 실험장으로 쓰이는 바람에 생태계가 무너져 산과 들이 에뮤들로 들끓는 곳이었습니다. \n\n그녀는 이곳에서 인간들에게 돈을 받고, 에뮤를 제거하는 전문인력으로 고용됐었습니다. 그 한심하고 덜떨어진 생물체들은 쏴도 쏴도 끝이 없었습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_TGuardian.title: 래비 마을 수호자
LanguageData.Rabbie_TGuardian.baseDescription: 제국의 장교였던 [PAWN_nameDef]은 주둔하던 행성의 인간과 결혼했었습니다. 아이도 낳고, 가족을 위협하는 주변의 해적들은 라이플로 벌집을 만들어 버렸습니다. \n\n더 이상 그들의 행복을 위협하는 것은 없었습니다. 행성에 끝도 없는 빙하기가 오기 전까지는요. [PAWN_nameDef]는 가족들만 우주선에 태워 탈출을 시도했습니다만 배는 우주 한가운데에서 고장났고, 동면관에서 표류하게 되었습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_MoonSailor.title: 래비 달의 항해자
LanguageData.Rabbie_MoonSailor.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]은 래비 동료들과 함께 우주선으로 달과 별 사이를 여행하며 모험하는 항해자였습니다. \n\n적은 행성 주민들을 괴롭히는 우주헤적들이었고, 전투와 승리의 나날이 계속되었습니다. 그러나 어느 날, 작정한 해적들의 매복에 걸려 [PAWN_nameDef]의 우주선은 격파되었고 어느 변방계에 떨어지고 말았습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_DesertRegiment.title: 정규군 사막토끼 보병연대
LanguageData.Rabbie_DesertRegiment.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef]은 정규군 사막토끼 보병연대 출신입니다. 

사막에서의 작전은 적과의 먼 교전거리로 인해 정밀한 사격을 필요로 했고, 연대 병력들은 그러한 분야에 우위를 보이는 래비들을 우선으로 구성되었습니다. 

[PAWN_nameDef]도 마찬가지로 행성의 사막에서 작전을 몇 차례 치렀으며 원거리에 있는 적을 신중히 제압하는 능력을 키웠습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_MountainRegiment.title: 정규군 산토끼 레인저
LanguageData.Rabbie_MountainRegiment.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef]은 정규군 산토끼 레인저 연대 출신입니다. 

산과 숲 등 험지에서의 작전은 기동력과 빠른 고지장악으로 낮은 지대에 화력을 퍼붓는 것이 가장 중요했고, 자연히 발이 빠른 래비들을 편성하게 되었습니다. 

[PAWN_nameDef]도 빠른 기동으로 적을 괴롭히고, 때로는 강력하게 부딪혀 섬멸하기도 했습니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Snowrabbit.title: 정규군 눈토끼 보병연대
LanguageData.Rabbie_Snowrabbit.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef]은 정규군 눈토끼 보병연대 출신입니다. 

추운 극지에 주로 파견되는 이들은 극한의 상황에서도 인내하고 눈속에서 발걸음을 옮겨 적의 후방과 주요시설을 파괴했습니다. 

[PAWN_nameDef]도 여간한 상황에서는 눈 하나 까닥 않는 강인한 정신과 적응력을 가진 래비입니다.
LanguageData.Rabbie_Spacemarine.title: 정규군 달토끼 우주해병
LanguageData.Rabbie_Spacemarine.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef]은 달토끼 우주해병 연대 소속입니다. 

달의 도시를 방어하거나 적의 문명화된 도시에 투사되는 최정예 병력으로, 월면을 침략하러 내려온 인간이나 기계병기들은 달토끼 연대 특유의 폭풍같은 탄막에 걸려 분쇄되었습니다. 

이 우주에서 래비 제국의 적이 없어지면 달토끼 연대는 다른 개발중인 래비 제국으로 보내지는것이 전통이며, 제국의 영원한 수호자로 추앙받습니다. 

[PAWN_nameDef]도 마찬가지로 그렇게 몇번이고 미래의 래비 제국을 향해 작전을 다녔습니다만, 이젠 은퇴하고 가정을 꾸리고 싶은 마음도 있습니다.
